ALERT.ANONYMOUS_STATISTICS: Anonymous usage statistics allows us to improve bMan based on usage patterns. The statistics are completely anonymous.

Are you sure you want to remove all servers?
This action cannot be undone.

APP_RATING.DISPLAY_NAME: bMan: Simple All-In-One CI & CD Manager
APP_RATING.TITLE: Do you find bMan helpful?
APP_RATING.MESSAGE: Would you mind taking time to rate bMan?

PLACEHOLDER.BUG_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: Please describe the bug and how we could reproduce it
PLACEHOLDER.FREE_VERSION:
First of all, thank you for choosing bMan. This free version of bMan allows you to manage a single instance of any of the supported* servers. You are also limited to 1 project which you must choose when you first add a server.
At the same time, we guarantee not to bother you with unwanted ads and annoying popups. You are free to use and enjoy bMan with its limitations for as long as you want.
